title: An Act to ensure economic opportunity related to alcohol licenses

abstracts.abstract: By Representative McMurtry of Dedham, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Paul McMurtry relative to licenses for off premises retail of alcoholic beverages located near other off premises licenses.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure
